verses.verse: And <WG2532> it came to pass<WG1096> afterward,<WG1722> <WG2517> that<WG2532> he<WG846> went throughout<WG1353> every city<WG2596> <WG4172> and<WG2532> village,<WG2968> preaching<WG2784> and<WG2532> showing the glad tidings<WG2097> of the<WG3588> kingdom<WG932> of God:<WG2316> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> twelve<WG1427> were with<WG4862> him,<WG846>

And <WG2532> certain<WG5100> women,<WG1135> which<WG3739> had been<WG2258> healed<WG2323> of<WG575> evil<WG4190> spirits<WG4151> and<WG2532> infirmities,<WG769> Mary<WG3137> called<WG2564> Magdalene,<WG3094> out of<WG575> whom<WG3739> went<WG1831> seven<WG2033> devils,<WG1140>

And <WG2532> Joanna<WG2489> the wife<WG1135> of Chuza<WG5529> Herod's<WG2264> steward,<WG2012> and<WG2532> Susanna,<WG4677> and<WG2532> many<WG4183> others,<WG2087> which<WG3748> ministered<WG1247> unto him<WG846> of<WG575> their<WG846> substance.<WG5224>

And <WG1161> when much<WG4183> people<WG3793> were gathered together,<WG4896> and<WG2532> were come<WG1975> to<WG4314> him<WG846> out of every city,<WG2596> <WG4172> he spake<WG2036> by<WG1223> a parable: <WG3850>

A sower<WG4687> went out<WG1831> to sow<WG4687> his<WG848> seed: <WG4703> and<WG2532> as he<WG846> sowed,<WG4687> some <WG3739> <WG3303> fell <WG4098> by<WG3844> the<WG3588> way side;<WG3598> and<WG2532> it was trodden down,<WG2662> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> fowls<WG4071> of the<WG3588> air<WG3772> devoured<WG2719> it. <WG846>
And <WG2532> some<WG2087> fell<WG4098> upon<WG1909> a rock;<WG4073> and<WG2532> as soon as it was sprung up,<WG5453> it withered away,<WG3583> because it lacked <WG2192> <WG3361> moisture. <WG2429>
And <WG2532> some<WG2087> fell<WG4098> among <WG1722> <WG3319> thorns; <WG173> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> thorns<WG173> sprang up with<WG4855> it, and choked<WG638> it. <WG846>

And <WG2532> other<WG2087> fell<WG4098> on<WG1909> good<WG18> ground,<WG1093> and<WG2532> sprang up,<WG5453> and bare<WG4160> fruit<WG2590> a hundredfold. <WG1542> And when he had said<WG3004> these things,<WG3778> he cried,<WG5455> He that hath<WG2192> ears<WG3775> to hear,<WG191> let him hear. <WG191>
And <WG1161> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101> asked<WG1905> him,<WG846> saying,<WG3004> What<WG5101> might this<WG3778> parable<WG3850> be?<WG1498>

And <WG1161> he<WG3588> said,<WG2036> Unto you<WG5213> it is given<WG1325> to know<WG1097> the<WG3588> mysteries<WG3466> of the<WG3588> kingdom<WG932> of God: <WG2316> but<WG1161> to others<WG3062> in<WG1722> parables;<WG3850> that<WG2443> seeing<WG991> they might not<WG3361> see,<WG991> and<WG2532> hearing<WG191> they might not<WG3361> understand. <WG4920>
Now <WG1161> the<WG3588> parable<WG3850> is<WG2076> this: <WG3778> The<WG3588> seed<WG4703> is<WG2076> the<WG3588> word<WG3056> of God. <WG2316>

<WG1161> Those <WG3588> by<WG3844> the<WG3588> way side<WG3598> are<WG1526> they that hear;<WG191> then<WG1534> cometh<WG2064> the<WG3588> devil,<WG1228> and<WG2532> taketh away<WG142> the<WG3588> word<WG3056> out of<WG575> their<WG846> hearts,<WG2588> lest<WG3363> they should believe<WG4100> and be saved. <WG4982>

<WG1161> They <WG3588> on<WG1909> the<WG3588> rock<WG4073> are they, which,<WG3739> when<WG3752> they hear,<WG191> receive<WG1209> the<WG3588> word<WG3056> with<WG3326> joy;<WG5479> and<WG2532> these<WG3778> have<WG2192> no<WG3756> root,<WG4491> which<WG3739> for<WG4314> a while<WG2540> believe,<WG4100> and<WG2532> in<WG1722> time<WG2540> of temptation<WG3986> fall away. <WG868>

And <WG1161> that which fell<WG4098> among<WG1519> thorns<WG173> are<WG1526> they, which, when they have heard,<WG191> go forth,<WG4198> and<WG2532> are choked<WG4846> with<WG5259> cares<WG3308> and<WG2532> riches<WG4149> and<WG2532> pleasures<WG2237> of this life,<WG979> and<WG2532> bring no fruit to perfection. <WG5052> <WG3756>

But <WG1161> that<WG3588> on<WG1722> the<WG3588> good<WG2570> ground<WG1093> are<WG1526> they,<WG3748> which in<WG1722> an honest<WG2570> and<WG2532> good<WG18> heart,<WG2588> having heard<WG191> the<WG3588> word,<WG3056> keep<WG2722> it, and<WG2532> bring forth fruit<WG2592> with<WG1722> patience. <WG5281>

No man,<WG3762> when he hath lighted<WG681> a candle,<WG3088> covereth<WG2572> it<WG846> with a vessel,<WG4632> or<WG2228> putteth<WG5087> it under<WG5270> a bed;<WG2825> but<WG235> setteth<WG2007> it on<WG1909> a candlestick,<WG3087> that<WG2443> they which enter in<WG1531> may see<WG991> the<WG3588> light. <WG5457>

For <WG1063> nothing<WG3756> is<WG2076> secret,<WG2927> that<WG3739> shall not<WG3756> be made<WG1096> manifest;<WG5318> neither<WG3761> any thing hid,<WG614> that<WG3739> shall not<WG3756> be known<WG1097> and<WG2532> come<WG2064> abroad. <WG1519> <WG5318>

Take heed<WG991> therefore<WG3767> how<WG4459> ye hear: <WG191> for<WG1063> whosoever <WG3739> <WG302> hath, <WG2192> to him<WG846> shall be given;<WG1325> and<WG2532> whosoever <WG3739> <WG302> hath <WG2192> not,<WG3361> from<WG575> him<WG846> shall be taken<WG142> even<WG2532> that which<WG3739> he seemeth<WG1380> to have. <WG2192>

Then <WG1161> came<WG3854> to<WG4314> him<WG846> his mother<WG3384> and<WG2532> his<WG846> brethren,<WG80> and<WG2532> could<WG1410> not<WG3756> come at<WG4940> him<WG846> for<WG1223> the<WG3588> press.<WG3793>

And <WG2532> it was told<WG518> him<WG846> by certain which said,<WG3004> Thy<WG4675> mother<WG3384> and<WG2532> thy<WG4675> brethren<WG80> stand<WG2476> without,<WG1854> desiring<WG2309> to see<WG1492> thee.<WG4571>

And <WG1161> he<WG3588> answered<WG611> and said<WG2036> unto<WG4314> them,<WG846> My <WG3450> mother<WG3384> and<WG2532> my<WG3450> brethren<WG80> are<WG1526> these<WG3778> which hear<WG191> the<WG3588> word<WG3056> of God,<WG2316> and<WG2532> do<WG4160> it. <WG846>

Now <WG2532> it came to pass<WG1096> on<WG1722> a certain<WG3391> day,<WG2250> that<WG2532> he<WG846> went<WG1684> into<WG1519> a ship<WG4143> with<WG2532> his<WG846> disciples:<WG3101> and<WG2532> he said<WG2036> unto<WG4314> them,<WG846> Let us go over<WG1330> unto<WG1519> the<WG3588> other side<WG4008> of the<WG3588> lake. <WG3041> And<WG2532> they launched forth.<WG321>

But <WG1161> as they<WG846> sailed<WG4126> he fell asleep:<WG879> and<WG2532> there came down<WG2597> a storm<WG2978> of wind<WG417> on<WG1519> the<WG3588> lake;<WG3041> and<WG2532> they were filled<WG4845> with water, and<WG2532> were in jeopardy.<WG2793>

And <WG1161> they came<WG4334> to him, and awoke<WG1326> him,<WG846> saying,<WG3004> Master,<WG1988> master,<WG1988> we perish.<WG622> Then<WG1161> he<WG3588> arose,<WG1453> and rebuked<WG2008> the<WG3588> wind<WG417> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> raging<WG2830> of the<WG3588> water:<WG5204> and<WG2532> they ceased,<WG3973> and<WG2532> there was<WG1096> a calm.<WG1055>

And <WG1161> he said<WG2036> unto them,<WG846> Where <WG4226> is<WG2076> your<WG5216> faith? <WG4102> And<WG1161> they being afraid<WG5399> wondered,<WG2296> saying<WG3004> one to another,<WG240> <WG4314> What manner of man<WG5101> <WG686> is<WG2076> this!<WG3778> for<WG3754> he commandeth<WG2004> even<WG2532> the<WG3588> winds<WG417> and<WG2532> water,<WG5204> and<WG2532> they obey<WG5219> him.<WG846>
And <WG2532> they arrived<WG2668> at<WG1519> the<WG3588> country<WG5561> of the<WG3588> Gadarenes,<WG1046> which<WG3748> is<WG2076> over against<WG495> Galilee.<WG1056>

And <WG1161> when he<WG846> went forth<WG1831> to<WG1909> land,<WG1093> there met<WG5221> him<WG846> out of<WG1537> the<WG3588> city<WG4172> a certain<WG5100> man,<WG435> which<WG3739> had<WG2192> devils<WG1140> <WG1537> long time,<WG2425> <WG5550> and<WG2532> wore<WG1737> no<WG3756> clothes,<WG2440> neither<WG2532> <WG3756> abode<WG3306> in<WG1722> any house,<WG3614> but<WG235> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> tombs.<WG3418>

(For <WG1063> he had commanded<WG3853> the<WG3588> unclean<WG169> spirit<WG4151> to come<WG1831> out of<WG575> the<WG3588> man.<WG444> For<WG1063> oftentimes<WG4183> <WG5550> it had caught<WG4884> him:<WG846> and<WG2532> he was kept<WG5442> bound<WG1196> with chains<WG254> and<WG2532> in fetters;<WG3976> and<WG2532> he broke<WG1284> the<WG3588> bands,<WG1199> and was driven<WG1643> of<WG5259> the<WG3588> devil<WG1142> into<WG1519> the<WG3588> wilderness.)<WG2048>

And <WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> asked<WG1905> him,<WG846> saying,<WG3004> What <WG5101> is<WG2076> thy<WG4671> name? <WG3686> And<WG1161> he<WG3588> said,<WG2036> Legion:<WG3003> because<WG3754> many<WG4183> devils<WG1140> were entered<WG1525> into<WG1519> him.<WG846>
And <WG2532> they besought<WG3870> him<WG846> that<WG2443> he would not<WG3361> command<WG2004> them<WG846> to go out<WG565> into<WG1519> the<WG3588> deep.<WG12>

Then <WG1161> went<WG1831> the<WG3588> devils<WG1140> out of<WG575> the<WG3588> man,<WG444> and entered<WG1525> into<WG1519> the<WG3588> swine:<WG5519> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> herd<WG34> ran violently<WG3729> down<WG2596> a steep place<WG2911> into<WG1519> the<WG3588> lake,<WG3041> and<WG2532> were choked.<WG638>

When <WG1161> they that fed<WG1006> them saw<WG1492> what was done,<WG1096> they fled,<WG5343> and<WG2532> went<WG565> and told<WG518> it in<WG1519> the<WG3588> city<WG4172> and<WG2532> in<WG1519> the<WG3588> country.<WG68>

Then <WG1161> they went out<WG1831> to see<WG1492> what was done;<WG1096> and<WG2532> came<WG2064> to<WG4314> Jesus,<WG2424> and<WG2532> found<WG2147> the<WG3588> man,<WG444> out of<WG575> whom<WG3739> the<WG3588> devils<WG1140> were departed,<WG1831> sitting<WG2521> at<WG3844> the<WG3588> feet<WG4228> of Jesus,<WG2424> clothed,<WG2439> and<WG2532> in his right mind:<WG4993> and<WG2532> they were afraid.<WG5399>
<WG1161> They also which saw<WG1492> <WG2532> it told<WG518> them<WG846> by what means<WG4459> he that was possessed of the devils<WG1139> was healed.<WG4982>

Then <WG2532> the<WG3588> whole<WG537> multitude<WG4128> of the<WG3588> country of the Gadarenes round about<WG4066> <WG3588> <WG1046> besought<WG2065> him<WG846> to depart<WG565> from<WG575> them;<WG846> for<WG3754> they were taken<WG4912> with great<WG3173> fear:<WG5401> and<WG1161> he<WG846> went up<WG1684> into<WG1519> the<WG3588> ship,<WG4143> and returned back again.<WG5290>

Now <WG1161> the<WG3588> man<WG435> out of<WG575> whom<WG3739> the<WG3588> devils<WG1140> were departed<WG1831> besought<WG1189> him<WG846> that he might be<WG1511> with<WG4862> him:<WG846> but<WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> sent him away,<WG630> <WG846> saying,<WG3004>

Return <WG5290> to<WG1519> thine own<WG4675> house,<WG3624> and<WG2532> show<WG1334> how great things<WG3745> God<WG2316> hath done<WG4160> unto thee. <WG4671> And<WG2532> he went his way,<WG565> and published<WG2784> throughout<WG2596> the<WG3588> whole<WG3650> city<WG4172> how great things<WG3745> Jesus<WG2424> had done<WG4160> unto him.<WG846>

And <WG1161> it came to pass,<WG1096> that, when Jesus<WG2424> was returned,<WG5290> the<WG3588> people<WG3793> gladly received<WG588> him:<WG846> for<WG1063> they were<WG2258> all<WG3956> waiting for<WG4328> him.<WG846>

And, <WG2532> behold,<WG2400> there came<WG2064> a man<WG435> named<WG3686> Jairus,<WG2383> and<WG2532> he<WG846> was<WG5225> a ruler<WG758> of the<WG3588> synagogue:<WG4864> and<WG2532> he fell down<WG4098> at<WG3844> Jesus'<WG2424> feet,<WG4228> and besought<WG3870> him<WG846> that he would come<WG1525> into<WG1519> his<WG848> house: <WG3624>

For <WG3754> he<WG846> had<WG2258> one only<WG3439> daughter,<WG2364> about<WG5613> twelve<WG1427> years of age,<WG2094> and<WG2532> she<WG3778> lay a dying.<WG599> But<WG1161> as he<WG846> went<WG5217> the<WG3588> people<WG3793> thronged<WG4846> him.<WG846>

And <WG2532> a woman<WG1135> having<WG5607> an<WG1722> issue<WG4511> of blood<WG129> twelve<WG1427> years,<WG2094> which<WG3748> had spent<WG4321> all<WG3650> her living<WG979> upon<WG1519> physicians,<WG2395> neither<WG3756> could<WG2480> be healed<WG2323> of<WG5259> any,<WG3762>

Came <WG4334> behind<WG3693> him, and touched<WG680> the<WG3588> border<WG2899> of his<WG846> garment:<WG2440> and<WG2532> immediately<WG3916> her<WG846> issue<WG4511> of blood<WG129> staunched.<WG2476>

And <WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> said,<WG2036> Who <WG5101> touched<WG680> me? <WG3450> When<WG1161> all<WG3956> denied,<WG720> Peter<WG4074> and<WG2532> they<WG3588> that were with<WG3326> him<WG846> said,<WG2036> Master,<WG1988> the<WG3588> multitude<WG3793> throng<WG4912> thee<WG4571> and<WG2532> press<WG598> thee, and<WG2532> sayest<WG3004> thou, Who<WG5101> touched<WG680> me?<WG3450>
And <WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> said,<WG2036> Somebody <WG5100> hath touched<WG680> me: <WG3450> for<WG1063> I<WG1473> perceive<WG1097> that virtue<WG1411> is gone<WG1831> out of<WG575> me. <WG1700>

And <WG1161> when the<WG3588> woman<WG1135> saw<WG1492> that<WG3754> she was not<WG3756> hid,<WG2990> she came<WG2064> trembling,<WG5141> and<WG2532> falling down before<WG4363> him,<WG846> she declared<WG518> unto him<WG846> before<WG1799> all<WG3956> the<WG3588> people<WG2992> for<WG1223> what<WG3739> cause<WG156> she had touched<WG680> him,<WG846> and<WG2532> how<WG5613> she was healed<WG2390> immediately.<WG3916>

And <WG1161> he<WG3588> said<WG2036> unto her,<WG846> Daughter, <WG2364> be of good comfort: <WG2293> thy<WG4675> faith<WG4102> hath made thee whole; <WG4982> <WG4571> go <WG4198> in<WG1519> peace. <WG1515>

While he<WG846> yet<WG2089> spake,<WG2980> there cometh<WG2064> one<WG5100> from<WG3844> the<WG3588> ruler of the synagogue's<WG752> house, saying<WG3004> to him,<WG846> Thy<WG4675> daughter<WG2364> is dead;<WG2348> trouble<WG4660> not<WG3361> the<WG3588> Master.<WG1320>
But <WG1161> when Jesus<WG2424> heard<WG191> it, he answered<WG611> him,<WG846> saying,<WG3004> Fear <WG5399> not: <WG3361> believe<WG4100> only,<WG3440> and<WG2532> she shall be made whole. <WG4982>

And <WG1161> when he came<WG1525> into<WG1519> the<WG3588> house,<WG3614> he suffered<WG863> no man<WG3756> <WG3762> to go in,<WG1525> save<WG1508> Peter,<WG4074> and<WG2532> James,<WG2385> and<WG2532> John,<WG2491> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> father<WG3962> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> mother<WG3384> of the<WG3588> maiden.<WG3816>

And <WG1161> all<WG3956> wept,<WG2799> and<WG2532> bewailed<WG2875> her:<WG846> but<WG1161> he<WG3588> said,<WG2036> Weep <WG2799> not;<WG3361> she is not dead, <WG599> <WG3756> but <WG235> sleepeth. <WG2518>
And <WG2532> they laughed him to scorn,<WG2606> <WG846> knowing<WG1492> that<WG3754> she was dead.<WG599>
And <WG1161> he<WG846> put<WG1544> them all<WG3956> out,<WG1854> and<WG2532> took<WG2902> her<WG846> by the<WG3588> hand,<WG5495> and called,<WG5455> saying,<WG3004> Maid, <WG3816> arise. <WG1453>
And <WG2532> her<WG846> spirit<WG4151> came again,<WG1994> and<WG2532> she arose<WG450> straightway:<WG3916> and<WG2532> he commanded<WG1299> to give<WG1325> her<WG846> meat.<WG5315>
And <WG2532> her<WG846> parents<WG1118> were astonished:<WG1839> but<WG1161> he<WG3588> charged<WG3853> them<WG846> that they should tell<WG2036> no man<WG3367> what was done.<WG1096>
